entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
